fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
* At day pick a target
* At night pick another 2 targets, the first one will become the role with the number above the day target, the second one below.
* Afterwards the day target will be dealt a basic attack. If they posess a defense of above basic it will permanently lower by 1 stage, minimum basic.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: * You will appear as the below role of a random player, you know which player, but you neither know their role or your appearance role.
